postButtonText.description: Button that opens editor / upload modal.

postModalButton.description: Button that submits the contents of the editor.

postModalPlaceholder.default: What would you like to say?
postModalPlaceholder.description: Placeholder for the message input field in the editor.

shareButtonText.description: Button that triggers a content share pop-up.

editorErrorAttachmentsRequired.description: Editor error message when no attachment is submitted but is required

editorErrorBody.description: Editor error message when no body is submitted

editorErrorDuplicate.default: As much as you like your note, you cannot post it twice
editorErrorDuplicate.description: Editor error message when user attempts to post the same content twice

editorErrorTitleRequired.description: Editor error message when no title is submitted but is required

productIndicationText.description: Text on card signifying that there are associated products.

productButtonText.description: Product-specific buy button that links to the product page.
